sentences: Steve Sowden (born, 14 February 1983), is an Australian Pentecostal worship leader and singer in the Planetshakers band.
Where he studied singing and earned a BA in Musical Theater from the Central Queensland Conservatory of Music in Australia.
Sowden was lead vocalist in Tokyo Disney-Sea Broadway Revue 'Encore' from 2005 through 2006.
The following year he joined the Ten Tenors group as lead vocalist in internationally acclaimed crossover vocal group from 2006 to 2011.
From 2008 until now he belongs to Planetshakers Church, where he serves as a pastor and singer.
Steve Sowden married on 4 January 2009 to Katie and together they have four children: Jonathan, Sophia, Eleanor and Joshua.
